text: Anthony Keith Waiters (1 February 1937 - 10 November 2020) was an English footballer. He played as a goalkeeper for , , and the England national team. He was the manager of Canada when they played at the 1986 World Cup Waiters died on 10 November 2020, aged 83. ==References== ==Other websites== *Waiters' official website *England profile Category:1937 births Category:2020 deaths Category:English association football goalkeepers Category:English football managers Category:Sportspeople from Merseyside Category:Blackpool F.C. players Category:Burnley F.C. players Category:Association football coaches
